Itemized Passive Description:
*Activates the Entrance Animation upon the character's entry*
- {passiveImg:once}Ki +4 to 8 randomly at the start of turn for 10 turns
*Basic effect(s)*
- Ki +2 and ATK & DEF 250%{passiveImg:up_g}
- All allies' DEF 30%{passiveImg:up_g} for 2 turns
*Before receiving an attack within the turn*
- Damage reduction rate 75%{passiveImg:up_g}
*After receiving an attack as the 1st attacker in a turn*
- DEF 400%{passiveImg:up_g}
- Damage reduction rate 30%{passiveImg:up_g}
- Ki +3, ATK 100%{passiveImg:up_g}, DEF 200%{passiveImg:up_g} and damage reduction rate
20%{passiveImg:up_g} for 3 turns
*As the 2nd or 3rd attacker in a turn*
- ATK 100%{passiveImg:up_g}, DEF 200%{passiveImg:up_g} and attacks are effective against
all Types for 4 turns
- ATK 400%{passiveImg:up_g}, DEF 200%{passiveImg:up_g} and great chance of evading
enemy's attack when attacking
*When receiving a Ki Blast Super Attack*
- High chance of nullifying it and countering with tremendous power
- Nullifies it and counters with tremendous power if there is a
"Kamehameha" Category enemy

7642.superDescription:
Raises ATK for 1 turn, 
causes colossal damage to enemy 
and lowers ATK & DEF

SpecialBonus.Description: Super Attack power will be increased even more!

7643.superDescription:
Greatly raises ATK, 
causes mega-colossal damage to enemy 
and lowers ATK & DEF

SpecialBonus.Description: Super Attack power will be increased even more!

Active Skill.Name: Tri-Beam
Active Skill.Effect Description:
Causes ultimate damage to enemy; 
Ki +24 for 1 turn
Active Skill.Condition Description:
Can be activated when there is a 
"Turtle School" or "Kamehameha" 
Category enemy, or starting from the 
5th turn from the start of battle (once only)
